search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for 17hats (17hats.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for 17hats can be found here: [https://www.17hats.com/pricing](https://www.17hats.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: 17hats Pricing | Options to Suit Every Small Business

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/5fb4b85b2767a48a86e2903a_17hats-%20white%20logo.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/)

All Features,  
3 Ways to Pay
-----------------------------

As a serious business owner you need it all which is why our one all inclusive plan provides you nearly everything you need to organize and automate your business. Try for a month or commit to one or two years and save.

Save $120

Monthly  

----------

$60

/month

Buy NOw - Save 50%

Save $120

Yearly  

---------

$600

/year

Save $400

Bi-Yearly  

------------

$800

/two years

Skip the free trial, BUY NOW and Save 50% on your first year of 17hats.

Buy a Yearly Plan for $300 or a Bi-Yearly Plan for $400.

Buy risk free with our 30-day money back guarantee.

All prices are in USD.

![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/67941e5797780011604e2295_b936508182d19a3bfdcb96787c95738f_Sara_Alepin.jpg)

"When I started with 17hats, I thought there would be a steep learning curve or that it would take a significant amount of time to set up. I was pleasantly surprised at the ease of use!"

Sarah Alepin, Networking Coach

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Yes, we currently have a 7-Day Free Trial. During the trial period you will have access to all features and our support team, so that you can see the full value 17hats provides.

[![Image 3: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6552bcfe639420b94b984c98_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/pricing#)

We understand life happens, you do have the ability to restart your trial once it is completed.

[![Image 4: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6552bcfe639420b94b984c98_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/pricing#)

Yes. Bank connect is an additional fee of $5/month. Through bank connect, your expenses will automatically be brought into 17hats.

You can also buy additional users and brands for your business.

[![Image 5: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6552bcfe639420b94b984c98_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/pricing#)

See how 17hats and Dubsado compare.

[![Image 6: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6552bcfe639420b94b984c98_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/pricing#)

Yes, due to the price hike, we are offering a sale for Honeybook members looking to switch. Learn more about our [Sweet Escape Sale.](http://sale.17hats.com/)

[![Image 7: Icon - Elements Webflow Library - BRIX Templates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6552bcfe639420b94b984c98_chevron-right-icon-elements-brix-templates.svg)](https://www.17hats.com/pricing#)

Making the right choice

Every platform will offer a variety of features. Many look the same on the outside, when on the inside they are wildly different. Because we build our core features in house (unlike others who use watered-down third parties), 17hats is built with interconnectivity in mind. Because of this, one feature can trigger another and can kick off a chain effect. No other software has the ability to fully automate your client experience from beginning to end like 17hats.

At the end of the day, there is no real comparison to 17hats. We have even been told that 17hats is Coke and all the others are Pepsi. How’s that for a comparison? ;) We like it!

Use our comparison grid to help select the best level for you.

Dashboard

![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 11: 17hats Dashboard View](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669d0d113182097cd3b231_17hats-Dashboard-Full-Screenshote.png)

Your Dashboard lets you check the pulse of your business, at a glance.

Contacts

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

![Image 12: 17hats Project Page Details](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec6720530842dd57bc07_Contact-Full-View-Screenshot.png)

Keep track of clients and their projects, with key info at your fingertips.

Projects

Unlimited

Unlimited

Unlimited

![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e209ca15ad86c467a1e0a05/5e61c17ce0268c32a4b9fbba_17hats-Projects-FullView-Screenshots-800wide.png)

Projects gives you a single place for documents, phone logs, and more.

Tag Management

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 15](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 16](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Easily find what you’re looking for – associate related Contacts and Projects.

Related Contacts

![Image 18](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 19](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 20](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Store the details of your Contact’s friends and family.

**Invoices**

![Image 22](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Create professional-looking Invoices and get paid online. Cha-ching!

**Quotes**

![Image 26](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 27](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 28](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Save time with professional Quote templates, complete with your logo.

**Contracts**

![Image 30](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 31](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Customize and email Contracts – clients can sign with an e-signature.

**Questionnaires**

![Image 34](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 35](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 37: 17hats Questionnaire](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066a72042ce3a6f111e285d_17hats-Screenshot-Questionnaire-Main.png)

Automated Questionnaires let you evaluate leads without lifting a finger.

**If/Then Logic**

—

—

![Image 38](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 39: 17hats Questionnaire](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066a72042ce3a6f111e285d_17hats-Screenshot-Questionnaire-Main.png)

Get to information quicker with intuitive Questionnaires.

**Document Confirmation**

![Image 40](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 41](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Clients receive an email confirmation when they complete a Document.

**Document Reminders**

—

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 46: 17hats Email Remainders ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066afbd42ce3a589e1e4cb4_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Document-Reminders-2.png)

Automated reminders nudge clients when important Documents are due.

**Document Templates**

![Image 47](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 48](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Create Document Templates – no more reinventing the wheel each time.

**Invoices**

![Image 51](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 52](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 54: 17hats Live Look At An Invoice](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669edadab2de6aefd8b75f_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Invoice-LiveLook.png)

Create professional-looking Invoices and get paid online. Cha-ching!

**Invoice Templates**

![Image 55](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 56](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 57](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 58: 17hats Live Look At An Invoice](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669edadab2de6aefd8b75f_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Invoice-LiveLook.png)

Reusable templates make creating and sending Invoices a snap.

**Quotes**

![Image 59](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 60](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 61](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 62: 17hats Invoice Live Look](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066a421593d3e9ebfe3f43f_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Quote-LiveLook.png)

Save time with professional Quote templates, complete with your logo.

**Quote Templates**

![Image 63](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 64](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 65](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 66: 17hats Email Template Options](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066a919dcd44bca4acbb24a_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Email-Template-2.png)

Create Document Templates – no more reinventing the wheel each time.

**Payment Processing**

**Stripe & Square**

**Stripe & Square**

**Stripe & Square**

![Image 67: 17hats Online Payments With Credit Card](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6066a3bf77e9d906b62449e8_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Invoice-PayCC.png)

See your money faster. Get paid online via Stripe or Square.

**Payment Schedules**

—

![Image 68](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 69](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 70: 17hats Payment Schedules For Invoices](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669ef940508c75313f4988_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-PaymentSchedules-2.png)

Create different due dates for distinct portions of your total invoice.

**Tipping/Gratuity**

—

![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 73: 17hats Tipping Feature On Invoices](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669f0136caa22cc5420d2b_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Invoice-Tipping.png)

You can enable Tipping for Quotes, Invoices, and Online Payments.  
Only available with Stripe and Square payment processors.

**Saved Card Data**

—

![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 75](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 76: 17hats Saves Credit Card Data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/607629dc5c6e99edf488503a_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Invoice-PayCC-SavedCard.png)

Clients can save their credit card data for easy payment of future invoices.  
Only available with Stripe and Square payment processors.

**Recurring Invoices**

—

**Included in Recurring  
Billing Module**

![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 78: 17hats Recurring Invoices](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669f2dec0dff60749cf5ac_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Recurring-Invoices.png)

Send an invoice on a recurring schedule: weekly, monthly, or custom.  
Only available with Stripe and Square payment processors.

**Recurring Billing**

—

**Module Available**

![Image 79](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 80: 17hats Recurring Billing Module](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669f34ac8993805622d9a2_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Recurring-Billing.png)

Charge a client’s credit card, automatically, on a recurring schedule.  
Only available with Stripe and Square payment processors.

**Remove 17hats Branding**

—

![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 82](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 83: 17hats Account Settings ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60762afdf01c56fcbf9cb8fd_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Custom-Settings.png)

With Level Two and Three, 17hats logo is removed from documents.

**Customize Logo**

![Image 84](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 86](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 87: Adding your custom logo and branding into 17hats](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60762af70e2a7955ec975a99_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Custom-Logo.png)

Add your brand’s logo to Documents, such as Quotes and Invoices.

**Custom Fonts & Colors**

—

![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 90: 17hats Branding Settings ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60762afbbce23c16192aa321_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Custom-FontsColors.png)

Customize the font and accent color for your 17hats Documents and more.

**Customizable Text**

—

![Image 91](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 92](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 93](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e209ca15ad86c467a1e0a05/5e5c4fafc9fe842a4e9fd45e_Quote-Contract-Invoice-Buttons.jpg)

Change the wording as you see fit for most buttons on your Documents.

Email Templates

![Image 94](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 95](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 96](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 97](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e209ca15ad86c467a1e0a05/5e61c701dbb4cf0eb57369a2_17hats-Email-Template-EMOJI-Screenshots-800wide.png)

Create templates to send consistent, professional-looking emails.

Outgoing Email

![Image 98](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 99](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 100](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Send emails quickly from inside your Contact’s Project page.

Incoming Email

—

![Image 102](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 103](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

Sync your regular and 17hats email to track client correspondence.

Email Read Receipts

—

![Image 105](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 106](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 107](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e209ca15ad86c467a1e0a05/5e6086132f8109cc640e0d3b_17hats-Emails-Template-Sent-Screenshots-800wide.png)

Know when your clients have read an email you sent through 17hats.

Save As Draft Emails

![Image 108](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 109](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 110](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/6036ec67205308240f57bc04_tick.png)

![Image 111: 17hats Save as draft email](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fb453e0437ba3e5108c7389/60669e31593d3e63a1e3df12_17hats-Screenshot-2000x1600-Email-Save-As-Draft.png)

\*Documents consist of Quotes, Contracts, Invoices, and Questionnaires. A Quote/Contract/Invoice nested as a single attachment counts as one document.

**‍**Your simple solution for Invoicing and business organization.

**‍**New to business? Get started the right way, so when you’re ready to grow your business, we will grow with you. Our Free CRM is the first step to business success.

*   Unlimited Contacts and Projects
*   Four Invoices per Quarter

*   Sales Tax Report
*   Email Templates

17hats pricing options provide a solution to suit every small business. Find the membership plan that is right for your company.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes options for monthly, yearly, and bi-yearly subscriptions with discounts for longer commitments.

Discounted yearly plan for first-time users.
features: Same features as All Features tier
